messages.body:
Susan Sus <ddsus@ozu.es>


Greetings to you, 
I humbly offer my friendship, and I hope this mail meets you in good time. However strange or surprising this contact might seem to you as we have not met personally or had any dealings in the past, I humbly ask that you take due consideration of its importance and the immense benefit it will be to you.

After careful consideration with my children, we resolved to contact you for your most needed assistance in this manner. I duly apologize for infringing on your privacy, if this contact is not acceptable to you, as I make this proposal to you as a person of integrity.  

First and foremost I wish to introduce myself properly to you. My name is Mrs. Susan Shabangu, mother of three and the Deputy Minister of Minerals and Energy of The Republic of South Africa for seven years running You may view my profile on the following link; http://www.gov.za/profiles/shabangu.htm   

I will now give you a general overview of the situation.

When I was sworn in as Deputy Minister of Minerals and Energy in 1996, with my influence, my husband Mr. Ndelebe Shabangu a very successful businessman was awarded several contracts in my ministry and had direct dealings with foreign investors in this field. Due to my political status, I was not involved in my husbandÕs business which was very vast and successful. My beloved husband died whilst on an official trip to Trinidad and Tobago in February 2001. 

When my husband died, I was contacted as next of kin by a private security firm in Europe to come forth with the Certificate of Deposit and claim a safety deposit my husband has in their Vault in his name. At that time, my children and I did not have an idea where the Certificate might be. We then instructed the security firm to continue holding the safety deposit until further instructions from me. Whilst preparing for the second remembrance of my beloved husband, I was going through his library collection and to my astonishment I discovered a Certificate of Deposit for the safety deposit with this private security firm, and other documents relating to the safety deposit in a book. The safety deposit which is a trunk, is stocked with hard currency (US Dollars) totalling $18,500,000 which was generated from cash payments from his business associates in the diamond trade from Antwerp, Belgium. 

Though I knew my late husband was in the diamond business, I did not have the knowledge that he moved funds in cash. This has came as a shock to me and my children, and we have decided to have this fund invested immediately, as any member of my family cannot hold such a huge amount in our name due to my political status, hence we sincerely propose to you to render us your most needed assistance in this regard. 

If you accept to render us your assistance, your role in this project will be to act on my behalf as a trustee to receive the funds in your Country for immediate investments commercial and residential properties abroad as well as profitable ventures. Though I believe this transaction should be based on mutuality, my familyÕs interest will be protected by a family associate, who is an lawyer attached to the South African Embassy in the country where the security firm is located. He is now aware of the safety deposit, and will assist in making arrangements for release of the safety deposit, and transfer of the funds. I have informed him that I am locating one of my husbandÕs business associates (you) to handle the funds and invest on our behalf, as he might be opposed to my decision to have you as a business partner if he found out that I barely know you.

For your reliable assistance, we are offering you 15 %($2,775,000) of the funds. 

I thank you in advance as we anticipate your assistance in enabling us achieve this goal. On hearing from you, I will forward your contact to the gentleman lawyer who will be representing us, and also give you his contact for both of you to communicate and proceed with the transaction. He will be working with you for a mutual conclusion of the process and I look forward to a long lasting business relationship with you. As you may understand, due to my sensitive position in the present government, it is not safe to communicate with me via phone or fax. This is why I have communicated with you with my private email address, and I like us to keep this way, for the safety of this transaction. 

Please contact me on my private email address; shabangus56@netscape.net whether or not you are interested in assisting us. This will enable us make alternative plans, in the event of non-interest on your part. 

With warm regards, 
Mrs. S. Shabangu.
messages.raw:
MRS SHABANGU

Susan Sus <ddsus@ozu.es>

From: Mrs. Susan Shabangu.

Greetings to you,

I humbly offer my friendship, and I hope this mail meets you in good time. However strange or surprising this contact might seem to you as we have not met personally or had any dealings in the past, I humbly ask that you take due consideration of its importance and the immense benefit it will be to you.

I will now give you a general overview of the situation.

The safety deposit which is a trunk, is stocked with hard currency (US Dollars) totalling $18,500,000 which was generated from cash payments from his business associates in the diamond trade from Antwerp, Belgium.

Though I knew my late husband was in the diamond business, I did not have the knowledge that he moved funds in cash. If you accept to render us your assistance, your role in this project will be to act on my behalf as a trustee to receive the funds in your Country for immediate investments commercial and residential properties abroad as well as profitable ventures. For your reliable assistance, we are offering you 15 %($2,775,000) of the funds.

I thank you in advance as we anticipate your assistance in enabling us achieve this goal. On hearing from you, I will forward your contact to the gentleman lawyer who will be representing us, and also give you his contact for both of you to communicate and proceed with the transaction. He will be working with you for a mutual conclusion of the process and I look forward to a long lasting business relationship with you. As you may understand, due to my sensitive position in the present government, it is not safe to communicate with me via phone or fax. This is why I have communicated with you with my private email address, and I like us to keep this way, for the safety of this transaction.

Please contact me on my private email address; shabangus56@netscape.net whether or not you are interested in assisting us. This will enable us make alternative plans, in the event of non-interest on your part.

With warm regards,
Mrs. S. Shabangu.

messages.body:
Dear STROGANOV,
 
 This correspondence is being sent to acknowledge the
 
 receipt of yours. We look forward to this project
 being a 
 very good foundation for a long lasting business and
 
 social relationship between us and you and that it
 will 
 blossom prosperously for all of us concerned. On our
 part, 
 we are dedicated to the prompt and successful
 completion 
 of the project through the mapped out procedures and
 we 
 hope that you will be inclined in the same
 direction.
 
 Your role will be that of a Trustee/Administrator of
 the 
 funds that will be transferred to you after due
 processes. 
 You will be required to stand as the
 receiver/beneficiary 
 of the funds carefully packed in a trunk box, and 
 deposited in a security house in Europe, in the
 custody
 of a diplomatic courier agency.
 
 I would need your assistance because as I would not
 be 
 able to handle that kind of business, and
 considering my 
 present status in my country, as regards my
 ministrial 
 post. What we want of you is to travel to Europe to
 claim 
 the consignment and keep it for us till we are able
 to 
 travel to meet you. You will now advice us or tell
 us 
 where or how to invest the funds preferable your 
 specialty.
 
 There are no risks involved in this transaction, as
 no one 
 knows the true contents of the box.My husband
 declared the 
 box as containing family valuables, and this was why
 it 
 was registered diplomatically, so no one would
 search or 
 check the consignment. The only people who knew the
 true contents of the box are you, my attorney and I
 To initiate this business and subsequent transfer of
 funds 
 to you, the following information will be needed
 from you.
 
 1. Your full names and mailing address, not P.O.Box.
 2. Your contact telephone and fax numbers.
 3. A copy of your ID. Be it international passport
 or 
 drivers license.
 4. Date of Birth.
 
 The above will be used to effect the needed changes
 by my 
 lawyer with respect to you being certified as the 
 beneficiary/receiver of funds.
 This will be achieved by:
 1. Obtaining a Power of Attorney establishing the
 fact 
 that you've known and certified ok to represent me
 and has 
 been empowered collect the consignment on my behalf
 2. A letter of Authority will be issued to the
 effect that 
 you have the full responsibility and
 authorisation to act in the interest and on behalf
 of 
 Mrs.Susan Shabangu and family which a copy
 will be given to the security company for their
 records.
 I would appreciate if you could send the above
 requested 
 information so that I can instruct my
 lawyer to prepare a power of attorney in your favor.
 This 
 will give you the full legal right to
 this consignment, as soon as I get all these
 information, 
 My lawyer will send the documents to you for your
 perusal.
 
 With diligence and speed, this business will be
 completed 
 soon as desired. If you have any
 questions about this business do please free to ask
 as we 
 are very much obliged to be at your
 service.
 Your reply is awaited.
 Yours faithfully,
 Mrs S. Shabangu.
messages.raw:
MRS SHABANGU

Dear STROGANOV,

This correspondence is being sent to acknowledge the receipt of yours. We look forward to this project being a very good foundation for a long lasting business and social relationship between us and you and that it will blossom prosperously for all of us concerned. On our part, we are dedicated to the prompt and successful completion of the project through the mapped out procedures and we hope that you will be inclined in the same direction.

Your role will be that of a Trustee/Administrator of the funds that will be transferred to you after due processes. You will be required to stand as the receiver/beneficiary of the funds carefully packed in a trunk box, and deposited in a security house in Europe, in the custody of a diplomatic courier agency.

I would need your assistance because as I would not be able to handle that kind of business, and considering my present status in my country, as regards my ministrial post. What we want of you is to travel to Europe to claim the consignment and keep it for us till we are able to travel to meet you. You will now advice us or tell us where or how to invest the funds preferable your specialty.

There are no risks involved in this transaction, as no one knows the true contents of the box.My husband declared the box as containing family valuables, and this was why it was registered diplomatically, so no one would search or check the consignment. The only people who knew the true contents of the box are you, my attorney and I To initiate this business and subsequent transfer of funds to you, the following information will be needed from you.

1. Your full names and mailing address, not P.O.Box.
2. Your contact telephone and fax numbers.
3. A copy of your ID. Be it international passport or drivers license.
4. Date of Birth.

The above will be used to effect the needed changes by my lawyer with respect to you being certified as the beneficiary/receiver of funds.
This will be achieved by:
1. Obtaining a Power of Attorney establishing the fact that you've known and certified ok to represent me and has been empowered collect the consignment on my behalf
2. A letter of Authority will be issued to the effect that you have the full responsibility and authorisation to act in the interest and on behalf of Mrs.Susan Shabangu and family which a copy will be given to the security company for their records.
I would appreciate if you could send the above requested information so that I can instruct my lawyer to prepare a power of attorney in your favor. This will give you the full legal right to this consignment, as soon as I get all these information, My lawyer will send the documents to you for your perusal.

With diligence and speed, this business will be completed soon as desired. If you have any questions about this business do please free to ask as we are very much obliged to be at your service.
Your reply is awaited.
Yours faithfully,
Mrs S. Shabangu.

SUPPORT THESE FRANKLY RATHER OUTLANDISH CLAIMS THEN I
WOULD LIKE TO SEE THEM_QUICKLY PLEASE AS I AM DUE AT
ANNIE'S BAR LATER

STROGANOV

messages.body:
Dear Stroganov,I quite
 appreciate your carefulness and that's reallyproved
 to me that you could be trusted. I do not havemuch
 to prove the authenticity of my claim but I havethe
 deposit certificate, which I found from my
 latehusband's personal locker later when the
 securitycompany demanded that I come forward for
 claims. Theentire relevant document shall be handed
 over to youand copy will also be sent to the
 security company fornotification and record
 purposes. My lawyer shall take care of the documents
 after youmust have done into a binding agreement
 with us. Inthat case sir, I will expect to have the
 information Irequired to enable my lawyer draft an
 Agreement andalso to raise a power of Attorney,
 which shall empoweryou to lay claims on my behalf.
 Once I hear from youwith the information, he shall
 take over with the restinformation.Yours truly,Mrs.
 S. ShabanguN-B. Further mails should be forwarded to
 this box.
messages.raw:
MRS SHABANGU

Dear Stroganov,I quite appreciate your carefulness and that's reallyproved to me that you could be trusted. I do not havemuch to prove the authenticity of my claim but I havethe deposit certificate, which I found from my latehusband's personal locker later when the securitycompany demanded that I come forward for claims. Theentire relevant document shall be handed over to youand copy will also be sent to the security company fornotification and record purposes. My lawyer shall take care of the documents after youmust have done into a binding agreement with us. Inthat case sir, I will expect to have the information Irequired to enable my lawyer draft an Agreement andalso to raise a power of Attorney, which shall empoweryou to lay claims on my behalf. Once I hear from youwith the information, he shall take over with the restinformation.Yours truly,Mrs. S. ShabanguN-B. Further mails should be forwarded to this box.

messages.body:
<smithattorneys@mail15.com>

 Attn: Mr. STROGANOV,
 
 A warm greeting from Smith Attorneys. I would wish
 to formally introduce 
 my self. My Name is Barrister Barry Dapo Smith of
 Smith Attorneys. 
 Corporate attorneys and Notary public.
 
 I have seen your mail and have also been told by my
 client Madam Susan 
 Shabangu about your contact and will be pleased to
 work with you to 
 achieve this once in a life time opportunity. We
 shall commence the 
 process of the money transfer by going into a
 written and signed 
 agreement that will define our roles and the wages
 to be expected at the 
 end of this transaction. It will straighten the
 transaction the more.
 
 The information you supplied is incomplete as you do
 not include your 
 telephone and fax number for easy communication. Do
 send the number 
 while I work on the agreement.
 
 Regards,
 Barry Smith
messages.raw:
BARRY SMITH

<smithattorneys@mail15.com>

Attn: Mr. STROGANOV,

A warm greeting from Smith Attorneys. I would wish to formally introduce my self. My Name is Barrister Barry Dapo Smith of Smith Attorneys. Corporate attorneys and Notary public.

I have seen your mail and have also been told by my client Madam Susan Shabangu about your contact and will be pleased to work with you to achieve this once in a life time opportunity. We shall commence the process of the money transfer by going into a written and signed agreement that will define our roles and the wages to be expected at the end of this transaction. It will straighten the transaction the more.

The information you supplied is incomplete as you do not include your telephone and fax number for easy communication. Do send the number while I work on the agreement.

Regards,
Barry Smith
